Okay, now for the real sketch suggestion.

"Human Raine on a date on top of a high rise restaurant balcony with draping lights and a view of the sleepless city." I have not decided on who Raine is on the date with but I am thinking Red to keep with the human theme.

Feel like bleh after the con. No bueno.
Saturday night, someone activated a fire alarm in the convention center.
Entire place was evacuated and the rest of the night was cancelled.
Someone did that in high school
Firemen and police had to be called and told not to show
There were some pretty legit cosplays this year though, that was nice.
I recall seeing this reaaaaly impresive Captain America dude, and without even realizing, in my head I was just like, "Fuck yeah, Murica."
P A T R I O T I S M
Didn't take many tbh. Couple panels, that was about it.
I don't like just taking pictures of randos, feels awkward.
Mostly when I wasn't in a panel, I was chewing the fat with exhibitors, getting them to take my card.
Me at SDCC: move, I want a picture of your booth background
Make it business related, and I can deduct some of Comic Con from my taxes.
I suspect that’s how I’ll be - not one to take pictures of people unless I know them
Wonder if Tom got Con plague or if he’s ok
